title: Login issue on dashboard
description: User unable to access the dashboard after entering correct credentials.

title: Payment gateway timeout
description: Payment request takes too long and fails during checkout.

title: UI bug in profile page
description: Profile image not updating after user uploads a new image.

title: Order cancellation error
description: System returns a 500 error when user tries to cancel an order.

title: Email notifications not sending
description: Automatic order confirmation emails are not triggering.

title: Search results loading slowly
description: Search results take over 6 seconds to load for certain keywords.

title: Mobile layout broken
description: Home page layout breaks on small screen devices below 360px.

title: Cart items not updating
description: Quantity changes in the cart are not reflected automatically.

title: Report export failing
description: CSV export function returns corrupt file for large datasets.

title: Two-factor authentication error
description: Some users receiving expired OTP codes immediately after request.
